subject: Make $5000/Week From Home! Work With BreezeLite!
body:
Hello,

Are you tired of your boring job? Want to make SERIOUS MONEY from home?

BreezeLite is looking for HOME-BASED DISTRIBUTORS to sell our amazing hairdryers!

No experience necessary! No inventory required! Just refer friends and EARN BIG COMMISSIONS!

Make $5,000 to $10,000 PER WEEK! This is NOT a scam!

Investment required: Only $299 for starter kit

To get started, send us:
- Your name
- Phone number
- Email
- Payment information

Limited spots available! Act now!

MLM-Money-Makers Team
